name: @sylphx/vex
description: Ultra-fast schema validation - 12x faster than Zod, 6x faster than Valibot
rules: Use pure functional validators: `str`, `num`, `bool` are constants, not factory calls
Compose constraints directly: `str(email)`, `num(int, positive)` - no method chaining
Use `object({...})` for object schemas, not `z.object()` style
Use `pipe()` for transforms: `pipe(str(), trim, lower, email)`
Metadata uses action syntax: `str(email, description('text'), title('name'))`
All validators implement Standard Schema v1 - access via `schema['~standard']`
Import only what you need - Vex is fully tree-shakeable
